mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEARCH_LOG(SEARCH_CODE, USER_ID, SEARCH_WORD, SEARCH_LOCAL, SEARCH_SAVE, SEARCH_ALARM, DEL_FLAG) VALUES(#{search_code}, #{user_id}, #{search_word}, #{search_local}, #{search_save}, #{search_alarm}, #{del_flag, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM SEARCH_LOG A, (SELECT MAX(SEARCH_CODE) CODE, USER_ID, SEARCH_WORD, SEARCH_LOCAL FROM SEARCH_LOG GROUP BY USER_ID, SEARCH_WORD, SEARCH_LOCAL) B WHERE A.SEARCH_CODE = B.CODE AND A.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND A.SEARCH_SAVE = #{search_save} AND A.DEL_FLAG = '1'
SELECT * FROM SEARCH_LOG WHERE SEARCH_CODE = (SELECT MAX(SEARCH_CODE) FROM SEARCH_LOG WHERE USER_ID = #{mem_id})

SELECT A.* FROM SEARCH_LOG A, (SELECT MAX(SEARCH_CODE) CODE, SEARCH_WORD FROM SEARCH_LOG GROUP BY SEARCH_WORD, SEARCH_LOCAL ORDER BY CODE DESC) B WHERE A.SEARCH_CODE = B.CODE AND A.SEARCH_SAVE = '1' AND A.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND (A.DEL_FLAG != '2' OR A.DEL_FLAG IS NULL)
SELECT A.SEARCH_WORD FROM SEARCH_LOG A, (SELECT MAX(SEARCH_CODE) CODE, SEARCH_WORD FROM SEARCH_LOG WHERE DEL_FLAG = 1 AND SEARCH_ALARM = 2 GROUP BY SEARCH_WORD) B WHERE A.SEARCH_CODE = B.CODE
SELECT USER_ID FROM (SELECT MAX(SEARCH_CODE) CODE, USER_ID FROM SEARCH_LOG WHERE DEL_FLAG = 1 AND SEARCH_ALARM = 2 AND UPPER(SEARCH_WORD) = UPPER(#{search_word}) GROUP BY USER_ID)
